data.name: Bob
data.text: 互联网主权的时代要来了

data.name: Carol
data.text: 不过感觉商务部会插手吧

data.name: Dave
data.text:
Re Carol: 按照报道的说法，确实是完全出售美国业务
ByteDance was previously seeking to keep a minority stake in the U.S. business of TikTok, which the White House had rejected. Under the new proposed deal, ByteDance would exit completely and Microsoft Corp would take over TikTok in the United States, the sources said.

data.name: Eve
data.text: Re Carol: 不可能直接插手的 插手就坐实了

data.name: Francis
data.text: 高层显然是评估过这个决定，决定放弃Tiktok了，这些早就上升到政治问题的问题国家肯定已经介入，和企业交换意见的。

post.text:
字节跳动同意剥离TIKTOK美国业务
08-01 21:42  同花顺金融研究中心
　　字节跳动同意剥离TIKTOK美国业务。(路透)
